content.text: Do you live near a farm, use water from a well, or is your swimming pool surrounded by dense vegetation? If so, it is possible that your water is contaminated by phosphates present in your environment. Over time, these phosphates can promote the growth of algae in the water. With our CLARITA ULTRA 3-in-1, PHOS OUT ULTRA 2-in-1 and ALL OUT ULTRA 4-in-1 products, Summer Smiles Â® has got you covered to get rid of phosphates, in addition to clarifying your water.
